title: User Authentication and Security Foundation
summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and core user security framework.
description: This epic focuses on establishing a robust authentication and security foundation for the bank's self-service portal. It includes implementing secure login mechanisms using multi-factor authentication (MFA), managing password encryption, session management, and logout functionality. Additionally, it covers compliance with security best practices and relevant standards to ensure sensitive financial data protection from unauthorized access and breaches.

title: Responsive User Interface Framework
summary: Design and implement a responsive, user-friendly portal interface accessible from multiple devices.
description: This epic involves designing and developing a modern, intuitive, and responsive user interface for the self-service banking portal. The interface should provide a consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. It includes building reusable components, defining style guides, and establishing accessibility compliance. User experience will emphasize ease of navigation and minimal clicks to accomplish tasks.

title: Personalized Dashboard and User Profile Management
summary: Develop personalized dashboard with banking products, eligibility, and profile management features.
description: This epic delivers a customer-facing dashboard that dynamically displays personalized products and services based on user profiles, preferences, and eligibility criteria. It includes building modules for viewing account summaries, profile updates, and notification preferences. Users should be able to access important account insights from the dashboard, supporting interactive components like quick actions and relevant promotional widgets.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable submission and processing of account opening and service modification requests with simplified workflows.
description: This epic introduces workflow-driven processes allowing customers to request new account openings or modify existing services directly through the self-service portal. Each process should be streamlined, minimizing the number of steps while ensuring data accuracy and compliance checks. It includes backend integration to validate requests and route them for approval, supporting draft-saving functionality for incomplete forms.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Implement document upload capabilities for users to submit required documentation.
description: This epic focuses on enabling users to securely upload, view, and manage required documents for account and service requests. It includes setting up document storage, metadata tracking, and validation mechanisms. The system must ensure data encryption during transmission and storage, maintaining compliance with data privacy and banking regulations.

title: Request Tracking and Notification Framework
summary: Build real-time request tracking and automated email notification system for user updates.
description: This epic establishes the infrastructure for providing users with visibility into the status of their submitted requests. It includes implementing request tracking dashboards, change status logging, and an automated email notification system triggered by workflow progress. The system should allow users to monitor all closed, pending, or rejected requests in a clear and accessible manner.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate self-service portal with the bankâ€™s existing core banking system for real-time data synchronization.
description: This epic establishes seamless integration between the new self-service portal and the existing core banking platform. It includes establishing secure APIs and synchronization mechanisms allowing real-time updates of account data, service changes, and workflow status. The integration should ensure reliability, error handling, and minimal impact on core banking system performance.

title: Data Storage and Performance Optimization
summary: Create an optimized database layer to support independent operations while syncing with core systems.
description: This epic involves designing and implementing a dedicated database system for the self-service portal to manage user data, service requests, audit logs, and document metadata. The approach should prioritize high availability, scalability, and fast response times. Data will be periodically synchronized with the core banking system using secure methods. Performance tuning and monitoring tools will be included to ensure responsiveness.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) ensuring users access only authorized services.
description: This epic ensures security and compliance by introducing fine-grained role-based access control. It defines user roles, permission sets, and authorization logic enforcing that customers can only access banking services aligned with their profile and privileges. It also includes admin-level controls for managing role assignments and audit logging of all access events.
